Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and exceptional benefits, I believe it would be an excellent investment for you. To make this opportunity more attractive, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure your purchase. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
